verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w Zophar|strong="H6691"\w* \w the|strong="H6030"\w* \w Naamathite|strong="H5284"\w*, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w said|strong="H6030"\w*,

\w Should|strong="H8193"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*? \w And|strong="H6030"\w* \w should|strong="H8193"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H6030"\w* full \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w talk|strong="H1697"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w justified|strong="H6663"\w*?

Should thy boastings \w make|strong="H2790"\w* \w men|strong="H4962"\w* hold \w their|strong="H4962"\w* \w peace|strong="H2790"\w*? \w And|strong="H2790"\w* when thou \w mockest|strong="H3932"\w*, \w shall|strong="H2790"\w* no man \w make|strong="H2790"\w* thee \w ashamed|strong="H3637"\w*?

\w For|strong="H5869"\w* \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* sayest, \w My|strong="H1961"\w* \w doctrine|strong="H3948"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w pure|strong="H2134"\w*, \w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w I|strong="H5869"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w clean|strong="H1249"\w* \w in|strong="H5869"\w* thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1696"\w* \w oh|strong="H4310"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*, \w And|strong="H1696"\w* \w open|strong="H6605"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w thee|strong="H5414"\w*,

\w And|strong="H2451"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* would \w show|strong="H3045"\w* \w thee|strong="H5046"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w secrets|strong="H8587"\w* \w of|strong="H5771"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*! \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H5771"\w* manifold \w in|strong="H5046"\w* understanding. \w Know|strong="H3045"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H2451"\w* \w exacteth|strong="H5382"\w* \w of|strong="H5771"\w* \w thee|strong="H5046"\w* \w less|strong="H3588"\w* \w than|strong="H3588"\w* \w thine|strong="H3045"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* deserveth.

Canst \w thou|strong="H5704"\w* \w by|strong="H5704"\w* \w searching|strong="H2714"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w out|strong="H4672"\w* God? Canst \w thou|strong="H5704"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w out|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w unto|strong="H5704"\w* \w perfection|strong="H8503"\w*?

\w It|strong="H3045"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w high|strong="H1363"\w* \w as|strong="H1363"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*; \w what|strong="H4100"\w* canst \w thou|strong="H3045"\w* \w do|strong="H6466"\w*? \w Deeper|strong="H6013"\w* \w than|strong="H6013"\w* \w Sheol|strong="H7585"\w*; \w what|strong="H4100"\w* canst \w thou|strong="H3045"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*?

\w The|strong="H4480"\w* \w measure|strong="H4055"\w* \w thereof|strong="H4055"\w* \w is|strong="H4480"\w* longer \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* earth, \w And|strong="H3220"\w* \w broader|strong="H7342"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

\w If|strong="H2498"\w* \w he|strong="H7725"\w* \w pass|strong="H2498"\w* \w through|strong="H2498"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* \w up|strong="H5462"\w*, \w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w call|strong="H7725"\w* \w unto|strong="H7725"\w* judgment, \w then|strong="H7725"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w hinder|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w*?

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* \w false|strong="H7723"\w* \w men|strong="H4962"\w*: \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w seeth|strong="H7200"\w* iniquity \w also|strong="H3588"\w*, \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w consider|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3205"\w* \w vain|strong="H5014"\w* man \w is|strong="H6501"\w* void \w of|strong="H3205"\w* understanding, Yea, man \w is|strong="H6501"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \add as\add* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wild|strong="H6501"\w* \w ass|strong="H6501"\w*â€™s \w colt|strong="H5895"\w*.

If thou \w set|strong="H3559"\w* \w thy|strong="H3559"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w aright|strong="H3559"\w*, \w And|strong="H3820"\w* \w stretch|strong="H6566"\w* \w out|strong="H6566"\w* \w thy|strong="H3559"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* \w toward|strong="H3709"\w* \w him|strong="H3559"\w*;

If \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H7931"\w* \w thy|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w put|strong="H7368"\w* \w it|strong="H7368"\w* \w far|strong="H7368"\w* \w away|strong="H7368"\w*, \w And|strong="H3027"\w* let \w not|strong="H7368"\w* \w unrighteousness|strong="H5766"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H7931"\w* \w thy|strong="H3027"\w* tents.

\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w then|strong="H1961"\w* shalt \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* \w lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w thy|strong="H5375"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w spot|strong="H3971"\w*; \w Yea|strong="H3588"\w*, \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* shalt \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w steadfast|strong="H3332"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*:

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* shalt \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* \w thy|strong="H7911"\w* \w misery|strong="H5999"\w*; \w Thou|strong="H3588"\w* shalt \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H4325"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w away|strong="H5674"\w*,

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \add thy\add* \w life|strong="H2465"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w clearer|strong="H6965"\w* than \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w noonday|strong="H6672"\w*; Though \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* darkness, \w it|strong="H1242"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7901"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* shalt \w be|strong="H3426"\w* secure, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w*; \w Yea|strong="H3588"\w*, \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* shalt \w search|strong="H2658"\w* \add about thee\add*, \w and|strong="H7901"\w* shalt \w take|strong="H7901"\w* thy \w rest|strong="H7901"\w* \w in|strong="H7901"\w* safety.

Also \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* shalt \w lie|strong="H7257"\w* \w down|strong="H7257"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* none \w shall|strong="H7227"\w* \w make|strong="H2729"\w* \w thee|strong="H6440"\w* \w afraid|strong="H2729"\w*; Yea, \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w shall|strong="H7227"\w* \w make|strong="H2729"\w* \w suit|strong="H2470"\w* \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* \w thee|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w But|strong="H7563"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w fail|strong="H3615"\w*, \w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w they|strong="H5315"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w no|strong="H4480"\w* \w way|strong="H4498"\w* \w to|strong="H5315"\w* flee; \w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w their|strong="H3615"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* giving \w up|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w ghost|strong="H5315"\w*.
